thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com | 4 of 110
thread.title: ALEXIE

author: ALEXIE
title: ALEXIE
text: Overall had a pleasant experience completing the course. Much value in its convenience and content. However, the course had indicated that it was only 4 hours long. This is not true -- I added each video clip in all chapters of the course to amount to over 6 hours of videos, not including time to complete chapter quizzes and final assessment. Credit should be given for a longer than indicated course that was earned to complete.
